name: Rusty Jim's History of the Sitcom: We Tolerate Linda
name_original: Rusty Jim's History of the Sitcom: We Tolerate Linda
description:
This is an entry to the TV Game Jam, 2019.

Course outline

Join the most esteemed media studies teacher of 2567 as they guide you through the long forgotten genre of the 'sit' 'com'.

You'll need two buttons on your pointing device, W, A, S and D keys on your typing machine and a SPACE BAR to enrol for the course.

This week's screening sees the eponymous Linda start work in a chocolate factory. Will she wrap chocolates? Will you, as a player-viewer interact? 

These are all choices.
